alert.note: Alert for Ellis (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 20 at 12:00PM CST until December 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM WEDNESDAY TO NOON CST FRIDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero. For the Winter Storm Watch, accumulating snow possible. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Ellis County. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, from 9 PM Wednesday to noon CST Friday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from late Wednesday night through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
